title: Average age of players in Major League Baseball by club 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player age in years for 30 number of Major League Baseball Players.
The maximum Average player age in years 30.1 is found at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and the minimum is found at Baltimore Orioles where Major League Baseball Player is 25.7.
The highest Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals has 4.4 more Average player age in years than the lowest Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
min_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Major League Baseball Player, and Average player age in years in each Major League Baseball Player on the y axis.
The maximum Average player age in years 30.1 is found at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and the minimum is found at Baltimore Orioles where Major League Baseball Player is 25.7.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player age in years for 30 number of Major League Baseball Players.
The maximum Average player age in years 30.1 is found at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and the minimum is found at Baltimore Orioles where Major League Baseball Player is 25.7.
The highest Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals has 4.4 more Average player age in years than the lowest Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
max_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Major League Baseball Player, and Average player age in years in each Major League Baseball Player on the y axis.
The Average player age in years is highest at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and lowest at Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
Second maximum Average player age in years is found at Major League Baseball Player Oakland Athletics.
The highest Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals has 4.4 more Average player age in years than the lowest Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
Average player age in years at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals is 30.1 , second place is Oakland Athletics at 29.9, and thirdly is Houston Astros at 29.8.
Major League Baseball Player Chicago Cubs, Atlanta Braves, and New York Yankees have the same Average player age in years.
The highest value 30.1 at Washington Nationals is almost 1.07 times larger than the average value 28.1.
The Average player age in years is 843.0 if we add up values of all Major League Baseball Players.
